body_html:
ByteTensors are accumulated into ByteTensor for now. We dont do accumulations into a different tensor type. This is expected.
Anyways, just fyi, maybe you are looking for: (a==b).all(), i.e. torch.all

body:
ByteTensors are accumulated into ByteTensor for now. We dont do accumulations into a different tensor type. This is expected.
Anyways, just fyi, maybe you are looking for: (a==b).all(), i.e. torch.all
